experience.description: Coded HTML5, CSS3, WordPress. Used Bootstraps for User Interface and User Experience. Gained knowledge in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JS, WordPress Plugin usage and fixing, project research, teamwork, and improving English document reading.

Joined multiple projects including ESIS (learned React.js, coded and reviewed front-end using React.js, React Redux, Redux Saga, Ant Design) and ILEAD (designed components and basic flows, coded and reviewed front-end, worked with a team of 3 members for sharing and support using React.js, React Redux, Ant Design).
Worked as a full stack developer, managed front-end code, started learning Nest.js and handled tasks, and learned Cypress for automation testing. Technologies used: React.js, Nest.js, Cypress.
